data.text:
@EU_Commission What is EU?
EU is a shambles
@EU_Commission Shame on you. You literally insulted people just for defending Internet freedom by calling them "mobs". #StopArticle13 #SaveYourInternet.
@EU_Commission How about REALLY caring about its citizens, democracy and human rights???????? 🎗️🎗️🎗️🎗️🎗️🎗️ Get ride of the people in power wanting the far right to be back in EU
@EU_Commission The shorter the EU's future will be, the better.

@EU_Commission We have already voted but thank you - we are on our way to freedom.
#brexit

@EU_Commission @NinaLueck I'd love to stay and vote but Scotland is being dragged out of the EU by English nationalists backed by Putin and American dark cash. Thr EU have to make all the campaigns publish their funding in full, starting with Steve Bannon.
@EU_Commission And it’s only the EU that promotes this?? .... I think the whole world 🌎 is promoting it 👍🏻 #Go WTO #BREXIT
@EU_Commission I want to vote and shape the future of the EU but @theresa_may @Jacob_Rees_Mogg and other Brexiteers are trying to stop me and millions of others from doing so. Please help us! 🇪🇺🇪🇺🇪🇺
@EU_Commission What about nationalism?☺
@EU_Commission Help!  Don't leave us behind, stuck on an island with Nigel Farage and the Yelling Vests!
@EU_Commission Kick ireland out of the eu. They want to destroy Israël so i do not want to pay tax to enemies like this!
@EU_Commission Did you guys get Sarah Huckabee Sanders to write this for you?
@EU_Commission Will see next year as we review our trade balance if it was a good deal
@EU_Commission Go fuck yourself you bureaucrat insect
@EU_Commission Brexiteers  said trade deals everywhere. Well done the UK. You are in the thick of things.

@EU_Commission Oh, I can? But, why do we complain about something we don't want in our europe, you say we are "bots"? 
The thing is, WE ARE NOT BOTS, and we are europe not you

@EU_Commission How about that, stop trying to talk this down and claim that everyone who is against this doesnt' know a thing about it. Admit that you guys made a Mistake. YOU decide what is happenig to our Internet but at the End WE decide what happens with you. #Safeyourinternet #Votes
@EU_Commission They only want to dump their goods on you not buy from you.

@EU_Commission Lobbyists painting us as bots or mob uncaring about consequences is one thing but @EU_Commission doing it is serious matter b/c we're not and they should have known and still said that. Now how can we believe them in the future, and if we don't how can we follow?#SaveYourInternet

@EU_Commission There is certainly no need to teach Singapore about ambient or labour protection. It is one
of the cleanest and most nature protected places on the planet, with strict no-tolerance labour safety and other rules...

@EU_Commission Are u People tzhat Hard and far behind from the reality that u still think u make the right Decission if u kick ur country and ur People with feets?The World shows u what they want!U work for ur People not for the Lobbys or ur ego!
@EU_Commission Happy #birthday #Lithuania

@EU_Commission So let me get this straight: You invite young people to „shape“ Europe, but as soon as they actually follow your invitation and raise their voices against, for example, #ACTA2 and #Article13 , you Ignore them and pretend they are all just Google Bots? LMFAO #SaveYourInternet

@EU_Commission We would, if you let us and wouldn't ignore us
#article13 #article11 #niemehrcdu #uploadfilter

@EU_Commission Please reverse the Copyright Directive ASAP. The only lobby you should listen to is the European populace, and it's clear that we overwhelmingly don't want this directive. #Article13 #Article11

@EU_Commission Yep MEP possibilities = wage £6500 per month plus allowance of £3500 (no receipts necessary) do not contribute to their huge pensions (tax free!) and if they stray cannot be prosecuted ..... good for some!! The rest of us 🇬🇧🇫🇷🇪🇸 what can I say?

@EU_Commission SHAME ON EUROPE THAT ALLOWS JAILING POLITICIANS.
#FreeCatalanPoliticalPrisoners
@EU_Commission @eu_echo @StylianidesEU each country can protect their own country - we dont need eu to "save" us.
@EU_Commission GET RID OF THE COPYRIGHTDIRECTIVE - its a disaster.
@EU_Commission Congratulations to our brothers and friends in 🇱🇹!
@EU_Commission Happy National Day to Lithuania 🎉🎈✨

@EU_Commission Are you mislead or just pure evil ? Get your information straight and represent the people , #article13 is liberticide, messy and not at all hindering the Californian companies who are battling DMCA jokes.

@EU_Commission WE ARE THE FUTURE! WE WILL VOTE AND WE WILL WIN!
#Article13 #SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission Where is a real fast train connection between main European cities and harbours shouldn't this be a priority for the EU commission
@EU_Commission Destroying the Internet as we know it and destroying democratic ideals all in one blow. Pure propaganda. And I'm part of the 'mob' now apparently.

@EU_Commission You should fight for more social integration, we must go into a federation of states and give the people a sense of a European identity, we can't do that just with the euro, we must go into a European confederation or federation...
@EU_Commission #SaveYourInternet #artikel13 #Article13 #NieMehrCDU #IchbinkeinBot
@EU_Commission so you're calling people who use their right to demonstrate a mob why?

@EU_Commission Tax China big plastic companies that sell in EU,with the help of their Chinese stores tons of low quality Chinese products.But as usual you will not do it, or the measures that u'll take will be against poor EU citizens that are forced to buy low quality products and not EU ones.
@EU_Commission „The Mob“? Are you utterly out of mind?

@EU_Commission What a bunch of lies and sugar coating, it is shaming as EU citizen to be reading how you are trying to convince us that is going to change anything for the people. 
It is there to shut us up so that the old school publishers can keep feeding us propaganda.
@EU_Commission @arekmularczyk Juz to zweryfikowala ......
@EU_Commission If we collect our waste plastics and bury them into gigantic concrete chambers, they will slowly release CH4, which can be collected to generate electricity.
@EU_Commission Except when it comes to #Article13

@EU_Commission “A better EU” would be one that listened and focussed its efforts on facilitating trading relationships and co-operative ventures between member countries, without dictating its political ambitions (e.g. Monetary Union; EU Army) throughout a ‘United States of Europe’.
@EU_Commission ALSO: who is the illustrator in the article? Just wondering because usually you are ment to at least mention them. What is the license for the image?

@EU_Commission Wth? You are NOT a PR-firm working for one side of the debate that is not done yet. 
As a creative, a person who live from my creative work - you do NOT speak for me. gth
@EU_Commission He llamado, fascist

@EU_Commission I do not see a document for students studying in another European country. Yesterday I had to legalize a document from English to Bulgarian! We need a single European Information Bank. Any official institution to use it!
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles #Article13 = No Future for the young People in the EU

@EU_Commission No, you are full of lies and courrption. I digusted that you ingored millions of your citizen and trying to shove censorship and filters down our throats. Also, stop calling people who are against A13 a mob.
@EU_Commission Europe as structured has no future. Not sustainable. A fundamental institutional architecture revolution is necessary.

@EU_Commission Please. Stop this shit Propaganda! We are not the Mob. We are for a free Internet and #Artikel13 is a extrem censoring of that.
Sorry, but lobbys are bullshit

@EU_Commission Why not forbid selling of beverages in small cans/bottles, and only sell them in recycable >=1L bottles with packing deposit money. And all other plastics (vegetables/meat) put a packaging deposite money on that too, so that the industry collects and recycles their own packages.
@EU_Commission tell that to small comapnies that now can't afford to store user content
@EU_Commission Is that a missile for the euarmy, or are you just pleased to see my money?
@EU_Commission χρόνια πολλά!!!

@EU_Commission And yet here you are yourselves spreading disinformation with vague articles likes that, embarrassing yourself by adding a meme instead of facts and data to explain as to how regular people or small creators, or small start ups benefit from #Article13. #SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission Meanwhile, idiot May is intent on having none of Freedom of Movement (whatever younger people in the UK want, e.g. Erasmus placements)...     :(
@EU_Commission Germany needs to leave the #EuropeanUnion asp and isolate its self entirely from it/them.
@EU_Commission A text of these and the legislation behind it, do more against the EU than a thousand nationalist populists
@EU_Commission Have you read your own law proposal? Because the people that proposed it and voted for it sure haven't.

@EU_Commission Brainwashing bullshit. Only the unelected EU Commission can initiate legislation, which is heavily influenced by lobbyists. Only the naive believe they can influence anything within the corrupt EU.

@EU_Commission @EUparliament 
I am European, Catalan, and it’s a disgrace that my vote as a European and a Catalan citizen has no voice in the European Parliament. My Representative is Puigdemont, president of my country, who was democratically elected. You exclude me & my rights
@EU_Commission @KevinSharpe59 Hard to read this as a Brit suffering under #Brexit madness
@EU_Commission #FreedomForCatalonia

@EU_Commission Yes it is. We must prevent internet censorship you are going to enforce.
If we fail, we will not be able to share our ideas freely...

@EU_Commission ... not to mention the Lithuanians ten of thousands free-corps of SS troopers fighting for a new world order mainly whiteout Russia just as they do today in a economic political warfare together with the @EU_Commission : "Bring the Russian economy to scream for a regime change"
@EU_Commission Europe is accomplice of the Spanish against the Catalan people. Europe; NO THANKS.
@EU_Commission My idea for a better EU is one where every EUropig dies in slow & horrible agony and the many decent peoples of Europe can go back to living in freedom.

@EU_Commission "modern copyright rules"

nothing modern about censorship. try again?
@EU_Commission What do you dare to call me mob?

@EU_Commission It still leaves problems in some areas. It costs a lot of money to translate academic qualifications and course outlines to register with professional bodies and that area isn't covered by this
@EU_Commission Propaganda.

@EU_Commission @AlanSherry1 Great people, Great Country. Visited Vilnius in 2005 as part of a Student Exchange programme with Edinburgh College (Formerly Edinburgh’s Telford College) and Vilnius Railway and Information Technolgies College. Time to visit again.
@EU_Commission am being charged by rental car #buchbinder for cross-border within EU. Is that legal?
@EU_Commission 👍🌷🇮🇹🇫🇷🇪🇺
@EU_Commission The U.K. Government is intent on removing the rights of its citizens to live, work and love in Europe. #BrexitBritain #RevokeArticle50
@EU_Commission Great news; if only we’d had this last year :)
@EU_Commission Wonderful news, thank you!
@EU_Commission Being part of the EU is not independence.
@EU_Commission Dear @EU_Commission I can't believe you just endorsed an article that calls a large part of your constituents "mob" in its headline. How deregatory is that?
@EU_Commission  Hello .I think it is urgent to help those #PolarBears in Russia and not kill them.Also some preventive measures should be taken in order for them not to disappear.
@EU_Commission It would be wonderful to see MEPs elected who want to disband the EU mafia.

@EU_Commission @OlgaFitzRoy Mmmm so Google which bought YouTube in 2006 for £1.65 BN and is now worth £165Bn  because it didn’t pay creators. Who it could easily find because they were musicians. Interestingly it spent $36 million campaignjng for continuing model that pays no musicians.....

@EU_Commission Hello, 
But how to protect his idea if the project is sensitive?
@EU_Commission Yo no entiendo por qué le tuvieron que poner nombre inglés.
@EU_Commission This was the time for the referendum (In every country affected): When the emphasis shifted from trading partnership to political union.

@EU_Commission Did you know that Catalonia have one of the oldest parlament in the world, and and his president is now in prison to allow a parliamentary debate?

#ShameOnEu 
#FreeCatalanPoliticalPrisoners 
#FreedomOfSpeech 
#HumanRightViolation
@EU_Commission Yes I have a great project for you! Try weaning Juncker off drink, a bottle of champagne at a time.
@EU_Commission Facebook NELSON LARICCIA @nelsonlariccia @nelsonlariccia5
